title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 30.1 - Identification of trucks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 30.1 - Identification of trucks

State Regulations

No milk dealer shall operate a truck or other vehicle from
which milk is delivered at retail or at wholesale in the State of New York, unless the name of such milk dealer appears conspicuously on the outside of
such truck or vehicle in a place where it can be easily read. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
30.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
